data.title: Jackson Hole Snow Report
data.meta_description: See latest Jackson Hole ski report, updated daily with snow totals & ski conditions. Find out current snow depths and last snowfall date.
data.text:
Snow & Ski Conditions Jackson Hole

Before putting on your skis, check the snow conditions at Jackson Hole one last time. Height and quality of the snow, date of the last snowfall, today's weather, temperature, wind... all the information you are looking for to have a great day of skiing. Please note Jackson Hole snow reports are sourced directly from the ski resort and are only recorded during the official ski season's opening to closing dates.

Jackson Hole : Closed

First Hand Report

Fresh snow. Great way to end the season at JH! Skiing was pretty good too.

Resort Overview

Nov 22

Projected Opening

Apr 13

Projected Closing

Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, located in western Wyoming’s Teton Village, is situated just 15 miles from the Jackson Hole Airport and Grand Teton National Park. There’s no shortage of hotels, motels and spas around the Jackson Hole and Tetons area. A variety of vacation rentals, condos and cabins are also available throughout Teton Village.

Plan Your Trip
